full_summary:
### Request for Information
#### Solicitation Number: DDR/RFI-2024-1
#### Reference Number: cb-458-73966607
#### Publication Date: 2024-05-01
#### Response Deadline: 2024-06-28T16:00:00

The Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) department invites interested parties to express their interest in leasing laboratory, office, and storage spaces at the David Florida Laboratory located on the Shirley's Bay campus in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Description
This request for information is related to competitive, selective tendering for real estate services, specifically for laboratory, office, and storage spaces. The leases are required to meet the needs of the David Florida Laboratory's operations.

#### Contact Information
For further information or to express interest, please contact:
*   Daniel Pageau
    *   Email: [daniel.pageau@tpsgsc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daniel.pageau@tpsgsc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (819) 635-2417
*   Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
    *   Address: 11, rue Laurier, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A0S5

#### Attachments
For reference, the following attachments are available:
*   [Inquiries and Responses (questions-et-reponses.xlsx)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37234/inquiries-and-responses_questions-et-reponses.xlsx)
*   [David Florida Laboratory Data Document (ldf-document-de-donnees.pdf)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37234/ldf-document-de-donnees.pdf)
*   [RFI 2024-1 Addendum 1 (rfi-2024-1-addendum-1.pdf)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37234/rfi-2024-1-addendum-1.pdf)
*   [RFI 2024-1 Addendum 3 (rfi-2024-1-addendum-3.pdf)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37234/rfi-2024-1-addendum-3.pdf)
